description:
Polygon data representing the Emission Control Areas (ECAs) designated under regulation 13 of MARPOL Annex VI (NOx emission control). The outline coordinates were processed in June 2019. The coastline was extracted from the ESRI Countries 2014. 
Available ECAs: 
1) North American area (regulation 13.6.1 and appendix VII of MARPOL Annex VI); 
2) United States Caribbean sea area (regulation 13.6.2 and appendix VII of MARPOL Annex VI)

Preferred citation:
Flanders Marine Institute (VLIZ), Belgium; (2020). Emission Control Areas (ECAs) designated under regulation 13 of MARPOL Annex VI (NOx emission control). Available online at http://www.marineregions.org/. https://doi.org/10.14284/396
name: Emission Control Areas (ECAs) designated under regulation 13 of MARPOL Annex VI (NOx emission control)
